title: 1.145 STATE BIRD.
text:
The loon, Gavia immer, is the official bird of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph of the loon shall be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: bird_name
variables.description: The scientific name of the bird being referenced.

variables.name: state
variables.description: The name of the state being referenced.

consequences: A photograph of the loon shall be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
